title: Santa In A Stetson
description: STARS IN HER EYESThough Diana Palmer left the bright lights of the big city behind for New Mexico, she misses the excitement now that Christmas is coming. But she's about to find out the joys of the season are just as big in the Land of Enchantment ... and just as romantic. They do things differently, though --- the rancher at her door with a fresh pine tree slung over his shoulder arrives unannounced and she can't help but invite him in for a cup of cocoa. Tall, sexy, and single, Lije Masters is all man ... and all she ever wanted for Christmas as warm and happy as two hearts can make it ...
author: Janet Dailey
